name: Post-Catalog Refresh Price Drift
description: Contracted prices are overwritten by standard list prices when the product catalog is refreshed quarterly. This pattern has affected 6 enterprise customers in the past 12 months.
rootCause: Product catalog update workflow does not cross-reference active contract price overrides before publishing
recommendation: Implement a pre-publish validation step that checks all active contracts for price overrides before catalog updates go live

name: CRM-to-Billing Sync Failure
description: Customer record changes in the CRM (cancellations, tier changes, address updates) are not consistently propagated to the billing system, causing downstream billing errors.
rootCause: CRM-to-billing integration uses batch sync (every 24 hours) instead of event-driven sync, causing timing gaps at month-end
recommendation: Migrate to event-driven integration with real-time webhooks and implement a daily reconciliation job to catch any missed syncs

name: Discount Approval Workflow Bypass
description: Sales representatives are able to apply discounts exceeding their authority limits without triggering the approval workflow, typically during deal close pressure.
rootCause: CPQ system allows discount field manual override when approval workflow is in 'pending' state, and the validation check runs asynchronously
recommendation: Implement synchronous validation that blocks invoice generation until discount approval is confirmed. Add hard stop for discounts exceeding tier authority.

name: SLA Credit Calculation Errors
description: SLA credits are either not issued when SLA breaches occur, or are calculated using incorrect base amounts (annual vs monthly, pre-discount vs post-discount).
rootCause: SLA credit calculation logic references inconsistent base values and lacks standardized cap enforcement across contract types
recommendation: Standardize SLA credit calculation engine with explicit cap rules per contract type and automated credit issuance within 5 business days of breach confirmation

name: Usage Metering Pipeline Lag
description: The usage metering data pipeline experiences delays at month-end, causing billing to undercount actual usage by 10-20% when the billing cutoff runs before all usage data is ingested.
rootCause: Billing cutoff runs at midnight UTC on the 1st, but usage data pipeline has a 4-6 hour processing lag for high-volume accounts
recommendation: Extend billing cutoff window to allow 12-hour data pipeline catchup, or implement a true-up billing cycle on the 5th of each month

name: Commission Plan SPIFF Revert Failure
description: Temporary commission rate overrides applied during sales incentive programs (SPIFFs) are not automatically reverted when the program ends, resulting in ongoing overpayment.
rootCause: SPIFF programs use manual commission rate overrides with no automated expiration date or revert mechanism
recommendation: Implement time-bound commission overrides with automatic expiration and revert, plus a monthly reconciliation report comparing active rates to plan rates

name: Auto-Renewal Escalation Gap
description: Contracts with annual price escalation clauses are auto-renewed at the original rate because the escalation logic is not integrated into the renewal workflow.
rootCause: Contract management system's auto-renewal function creates a carbon copy of the existing contract without applying escalation clause calculations
recommendation: Enhance auto-renewal workflow to parse escalation clauses and apply rate adjustments before generating the renewal contract. Add a pre-renewal review queue for contracts with complex pricing terms.

name: Professional Services Revenue Recognition Timing
description: Revenue for professional services engagements is recognized based on project management system dates rather than actual delivery confirmation, leading to ASC 606 compliance risks.
rootCause: Revenue recognition triggers are tied to planned milestone dates in the project management tool rather than customer-signed delivery acceptance forms
recommendation: Implement a delivery acceptance workflow that requires customer sign-off before revenue recognition is triggered. Add automated alerts for unbilled services exceeding 15 days post-delivery.
